Tip of the Day
Make sure you equip your items to get their effects, most don't work from inventory alone.

A blue ice-like sword made from farganite bars.

The Farganite sword item is a crafted item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

This item has no attributes.

Job Boards
